title: Account hacked
body: My main account has been hacked, someone is playing on it right now. I contacted support through email yesterday and only got a reply from a blitz bot. The guy who hacked it is playing on it right now. I have spend irl money on this account (buying skins and champions) and im not receiving any help. The account means alot to me {{item:3070}} and im beggining to think im not going to get no help getting it back.

replies.body:
I suggest continuing to work with Blitzcrank Bot or hit the **Request Human** button to be transferred to an account specialist. We're pretty slammed with tickets at the moment, though, so there may be a bit of a delay in someone getting back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
